SELECT inquiry_num, inquiry_title, MEMBER.member_num, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_answer, inquiry_regdate, member_email, member_nickname, inquiry_answer_date FROM INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING (member_num) ORDER BY INQUIRY_REGDATE DESC

select payment.pay_num , payment.member_num , member.member_nickname , club.club_name, payment.pay_method , payment.pay_date , payment.pay_amount from payment left join club on club.club_num = payment.club_num left join member on payment.member_num = member.member_num

SELECT club_num, club_category, club_name, club_leader, club_town, club_kind, club_onoff, club_startdate, club_enddate FROM CLUB JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.member_nickname = CLUB.club_leader ORDER BY club_num DESC;
